title: eBay
description: eBay, renowned for its distinctive and vibrant brand colors, features a palette that perfectly encapsulates its dynamic and diverse marketplace. Derived from its iconic logo, the color scheme includes a bold red (#E53238), a vivid blue (#0064D2), a cheerful yellow (#F5AF02), and a fresh green (#86B817). These colors are widely recognized and sourced from eBay's official branding and design guidelines.
